card.heading: Sync Rules for Contacts
contents: Configure how customer data is synced from Chargebee to HubSpot. Set rules to manage 'Contacts' in HubSpot from Chargebee. Learn more

params.dispName: Choose customers you'd like to sync
Choose what happens when a customer in Chargebee does not have a matching contact in HubSpot
params.desc: Chargebee will match customers with contacts in HubSpot using the Email ID field. When no matching contacts are found, you can choose to create a contact in HubSpot or do nothing

params.dispName: Choose what happens when a customer in Chargebee has a matching contact in HubSpot. Learn more
params.desc: You can choose to update empty fields or override existing fields in HubSpot with customer details from Chargebee.

params.dispName: Choose the Lifecycle Stage in HubSpot you'd like to create/update the contact in, when the Chargebee customer

card.heading: Sync Rules for Deals
contents: Configure how you'd like to handle deals in HubSpot when subscription are created in Chargebee. Learn more

label.dispName: All deals will be created or updated in the HubSpot Sales Pipeline

dropDownItemsList.helptext: The last Created Open deal will be updated in HubSpot. Learn More

params.dispName: When a subscription is created in Chargebee
Choose the deal stage in HubSpot you'd like to create this deal in
Create new deals in Hubspot for subscriptions that are in trial

card.heading: Sync Rules for Fields
contents: Set rules to sync fields from Chargebee to Hubspot . Learn more

message.message: If you need to sync additional fields from Chargebee to HubSpot, you may enable this option

params.dispName: Sync additional fields from Chargebee to HubSpot

checkboxes.desc: Customer billing day of week mode
Customer business customer without vat number

params.helptext: Choose the fields you'd like to sync

checkboxes.desc: Customer billing day of week mode

card.heading: Sync Rules for Orders
contents: Set rules to sync orders from Chargebee to Hubspot. Learn more

message.message: Chargebee will sync your orders and related details like last order date, next order date and so on

params.dispName: Allow Chargebee to sync orders to HubSpot
